original_text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me, it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea.
korean_text: 누구든지 나를 믿는 이 작은 자 중 하나를 실족하게 하면 차라리 연자 맷돌이 그 목에 달려서 깊은 바다에 빠뜨려지는 것이 나으니라

sentences.original_text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 누구든지 이 어린 아이 중 하나를 범죄하게 하면

sentences.original_text: that a millstone were hanged about his neck
and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 바다 깊은 곳에 빠지는 것이 더 나으리라
